description:
It's always the quiet ones you have to watch out for!
Tad was very shy about his first session on camera, so I was pretty sure he wouldn't be the "experimenting" type. Boy was I wrong...
I asked him about getting fucked by another guy and he (very demurely) said he was down for it. I wanted to pair him with someone who was experienced, someone who could initiate him gently but thoroughly, someone who could "teach" him like I used to in the early days <grin>.
Ajay has loved breaking in my boys, so I thought he would be an ideal choice. He started out lightly, but then moved on to deflowering Tad with a glass dildo and then fucking him silly.
I'm not quite sure what Tad thought of the whole experience. He seemed to really like it. In the showers afterward I offered him a "penny for his thoughts" and (with a cute little smile) the only words out of his mouth were, "I gotta go find a chick tonight!"
title: Tad Gets Fucked
